page.title: 15MUSIC, West Cambs.
page.content:
Catworth Singers (including members from other villages) perform also as Church Choir. Children's recorder group made up for family services.
Music evenings held in Village Hall at Catworth (Jazz), barn at Molesworth (classical quartet), Music Society at Kimbolton
Violin teacher and composer live in Catworth. Villagers take part in annual Music Festival at Bedford and Philharmonic Choir at Huntingdon.
Teenagers get together to form groups with guitar/drums etc. but no profes- sional local groups at present.
Children learn to play piano/recorder/ violin/other brass/woodwind at school.
